edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate.trainer

Class TrainerAcousticModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate.TiedStateAcousticModel
      • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate.trainer.TrainerAcousticModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AcousticModel, Configurable

    public class TrainerAcousticModel
extends TiedStateAcousticModel
    Represents the generic interface to the Acoustic Model for sphinx4

          throws IOException

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the acoustic model
        Throws:
        IOException - if the model could not be loaded
        FileNotFoundException - if the model does not exist

      • load

        public void load()
          throws IOException,
                 FileNotFoundException
        Loads the acoustic models. This has to be explicitly requested in this class.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the model could not be loaded
        FileNotFoundException - if the model does not exist

        public void accumulate(int index,
                       TrainerScore[] trainerScore,
                       TrainerScore[] nextTrainerScore)
        Accumulate the current TrainerScore into the buffers.
        Parameters:
        index - the current index into the TrainerScore vector
        trainerScore - the TrainerScore in the current frame
        nextTrainerScore - the TrainerScore in the next frame

      • updateLogLikelihood

        public void updateLogLikelihood()
        Update the log likelihood. This should be called at the end of each utterance.

      • normalize

        Normalize the buffers and update the models.
        Returns:
        the log likelihood for the whole training set
